patch.data:
Tiny patch this week! Just a little tuning to Zalgus' ultimate, and some bug fixes here and there! Enjoy the Friday-Sunday weekend of Dawngate!

Balance and Tuning

Shapers

• Final Chapter (R)
    • The Power scaling on this ability has been reduced to 1.25, down from 1.5.

Front-End Client
  • Fixed an issue where it was difficult to right-click Users in the Social Panel.
  • Fixed an issue where chat lists could lose their Scroll Bar.

In-Game Chat
  • Chat will no longer fade out when typing long messages.
  • When whispering to other users, typing their usernames is no longer case-sensitive.
  • Users may now whisper to another player more than one time in a row.

Player Profile
  • Fixed an issue where the Career Graph would occasionally not display.
  • Fixed several small issues with the Shaper sorting in the Career and Recent History sections.

Streaming / Game Recording
  • The in-game cursor will now correctly display when streaming or recording gameplay footage of Dawngate.
